name: 01000110100111010010001 FUNDS FOR OYXABATEN 01000110100111010010001
description: OYX is a cryptocurrency financing project, created by Elias Oyxabaten Suruí, which urgently aims to bring food security and basic resources to the Paiter Suruí and Cinta Larga villages, in Rondônia and Mato Grosso state, Brazil.  /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// It also has a purpose that involves the empowerment of native people around the world, and use of the blockchain in order to perpetuate their memory and strengthen their communities.  /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// Guardians of the forest and biodiversity found a technology (blockchain) and is now the main weapon to register develop and disseminate achieve autonomy so desired. With this new weapon (blockchain) we will win the battle without bloodshed /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// The project is now stuck due to lack of investment. All the $ from the sales of this nft will go to help fund OYX and to buy food and resources to the Suruí and Cinta Larga villages. /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// https://oyxabaten.com/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// @oyxabaten /// @Augusto47529918 /// @LucianoDuCiRiL0 /// @xaoo777 /// @marcos_r_c
